title: Textile, 18th–19th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: background fabric: plain weave with contiuous supplementary wefts.
Inset: 7&1 harness satin with brocading wefts.
description:
Panel of red, yellow and white woven silk with inset panel of pale tones showing a woman with a basket of flowers.
The inset panel is earlier than the background fabric. 
Panel was used as a wall covering. there are staill traces of glue on the back.
